# Setup

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
set.seed(100)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
if (!require("pacman")) install.packages("pacman")
p_load(tidyverse)
```

# Simulate Data

```{r}
n_per_tester <- 15
# parameters
names <- c("julia.wyss", "anna.roesli", "alina.schaerer", "fabia.somalvico", "nora.schaer")

n <- n_per_tester*length(names)
condition <- c("video", "text.bild", "text")
conditions <- rep(condition, times = n_per_tester/length(condition))

condition <- sample(conditions, n_per_tester, replace = FALSE)
for(i in 1:4){
  condition <- c(condition, sample(conditions, n_per_tester, replace = FALSE))
}

dataframe <- data.frame(names = rep(names, each = n_per_tester),
                        condition = condition)
```

```{r}
write.csv(dataframe, "testung.csv")
```
